explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a machine learning-based enterprise evaluation method, explicitly mentioning the use of machine learning techniques.
explanations.semi-supervised learning: The method includes semi-supervised learning, specifically label propagation on the enterprise network, to objectively evaluate enterprises.
explanations.classification: The output of the method is measured as a score and later binned into five grades, which involves classification of enterprises into different categories.
explanations.feature learning: The paper discusses deriving several remarkable features from the analysis to improve interpretability, which relates to feature learning.
explanations.feature representation: The method involves quantifying various information to identify enterprise characteristics, which is related to feature representation.
